original_text: He brought the tribe of Benjamin near by its clans, and the clan of the Matrites was taken by lot; and Saul the son of Kish was taken by lot. But when they sought him, he could not be found.
korean_text: 베냐민 지파를 그들의 가족별로 가까이 오게 하였더니 마드리의 가족이 뽑혔고 그 중에서 기스의 아들 사울이 뽑혔으나 그를 찾아도 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: He brought the tribe of Benjamin near by its clans
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베냐민 지파를 그 가족들 가운데로 가까이 데려오고

sentences.original_text: and the clan of the Matrites was taken by lot
and Saul the son of Kish was taken by lot
